author: charub
body: The Profiles were getting loaded from wrong paths. Correcting all profile paths.

comments.author: mirichmo
comments.body: Please add some Pester tests to verify your change.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Charu, please update your GitHub profile #Closed

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @charub this is a simple fix that doesn't seem to need two commits. Could you please squash them into one commit?

comments.author: vors
comments.body: @daxian-dbw you can do that yourself while merging. I think we settled to do that according to @lzybkr

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @vors that comment was made before we enabled the squash feature. Now we are waiting for Charu to address @mirichmo 's comment.

title: Correcting Powershell profile paths for Windows and Linux
